homepage.hero_text: Do you own a Restaurant? Take your business to a new level by making use of the new digitized menu through QR Codes. It is fast and also easy to use!
homepage.ordering: Ordering just became fast and easy
homepage.how_text: From kitchen to table, fast & easy
homepage.how_card1_text: Whether you want us to help you fill your menu with items or you choose to create it by yourself, our complete and user-friendly system is available for you.
homepage.how_card2_text: Our classy and personalized QR code holders make it easier for customers to be able to access your digital menu in a few days.
homepage.how_card3_title: Updates Can Be Done At Any Time
homepage.how_card3_text: Point, click, deploy. You can deploy hundreds of thousands up to tens of millions of OnPage code optimizations right from the Alli AI dashboard.
homepage.how_card4_text: Point, click, deploy. You can deploy hundreds of thousands up to tens of millions of OnPage code optimizations right from the Alli AI dashboard.
homepage.name: Type your name
homepage.accept: I accept all terms and conditions
homepage.about_mission_text: Our main mission is to facilitate the interaction between our partners and their customers. This will be done by making it very easy and fast for customers to purchase things and make orders through the digitized menu. All you just have to do is pick up your mobile device, scan the QR code, place your order, and make payment. As simple as ABC!
homepage.about_vision_text: We want to ensure that the QR codes can be accessible everywhere in the world. We also aspire to connect with as many POS systems as possible and simplify the whole process of making a purchase. This includes taking an order, accepting the order, and making payment.
homepage.values_card1_text: We help you to work fast and easy
homepage.values_card2_text: And we do work with passion
homepage.values_card3_text: We build trust & transparency with our customers
homepage.landing_menu_title: Why have a qr based menu?
homepage.landing_menu_card1_text: Your clients don’t need to install or do anything special. Just scan & browse
homepage.landing_menu_card2_text: Your clients don’t need to install or do anything special. Just scan & browse
homepage.landing_menu_card3_text: Your clients don’t need to install or do anything special. Just scan & browse
homepage.landing_menu_card4_text: Your clients don’t need to install or do anything special. Just scan & browse
homepage.why_card1_text: Just give us the particular POS system that you’re making use of. We will help you to determine whether it is already integrated or not.
homepage.why_card2_text: You will enjoy it more when the whole functionalities of Adhoc are being utilized. The Order and Payment feature has been added for you.
homepage.why_card3_text: You will enjoy it more when the whole functionalities of Adhoc are being utilized. The Order and Payment feature has been added for you.
homepage.why_card4_text: The waiters will be able to save over 50% of their time. With Adhoc, they won’t need to spend time going back and forth to serve your clients.
homepage.pricing_custom: For this package, large partners can have a custom agreement.
homepage.choose_title: CHOOSE OUR PRODUCTS TO BOOST YOUR BUSINESS
homepage.try_text: Scan me with your phone to see the uniqueness of Adhoc and become our partner today!
